sourcesContent:
{entries.flatMap(entry => { // 백엔드에서 받은 lines 데이터 사용 const lines = entry.lines && entry.lines.length > 0 ? entry.lines : [ { id: 0, account_id: accounts.length > 0 ? accounts[0].id : 0, account_code: accounts.length > 0 ? accounts[0].code : '', account_name: accounts.length > 0 ? accounts[0].name : '', name: entry.name || '분개장 생성 시 입력한 적요가 여기에 표시됩니다', debit: entry.amount_total || 0, credit: 0, partner_id: undefined, partner_code: '', partner_name: '' } ]; return lines.map((line, idx) => { // account, partner 정보는 line에 직접 있으면 우선 사용, 없으면 accounts/partners에서 찾아서 보완 const account = accounts.find(acc => acc.id === line.account_id); const partner = partners.find(p => p.id === line.partner_id); return (
  • {entry.date} {entry.ref} {line.debit > 0 ? '차변' : '대변'} {line.account_code || account?.code || ''} {line.account_name || account?.name || ''} {line.debit > 0 ? line.debit.toLocaleString() : ''} {line.credit > 0 ? line.credit.toLocaleString() : ''} {line.partner_code || partner?.code || ''} {line.partner_name || partner?.name || ''} {line.name || ''}
    • ); }); })}
